verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
Thou shalt have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> unto thee any graven image, <S%H6459><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that <S%H834><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> or that <S%H834><s%> is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> or that <S%H834><s%> is in the water <S%H4325><s%> under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> bow down thyself <S%H7812><s%> to them, nor <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me;
And showing <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> unto thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in vain; <S%H7723><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834><s%> taketh <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the <S%H853><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to keep it holy. <S%H6942><s%>
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shalt thou labor, <S%H5647><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy work: <S%H4399><s%>

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> in it thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> nor thy son, <S%H1121><s%> nor thy daughter, <S%H1323><s%> thy manservant, <S%H5650><s%> nor thy maidservant, <S%H519><s%> nor thy cattle, <S%H929><s%> nor thy stranger <S%H1616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is within thy gates: <S%H8179><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth, <S%H776><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> in them is, and rested <S%H5117><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the <S%H853><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and hallowed <S%H6942><s%> it.

Honor <S%H3513><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%> and thy mother: <S%H517><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thy days <S%H3117><s%> may be long <S%H748><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee.
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> kill. <S%H7523><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> commit adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> steal. <S%H1589><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against thy neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> covet <S%H2530><s%> thy neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> covet <S%H2530><s%> thy neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> nor his manservant, <S%H5650><s%> nor his maidservant, <S%H519><s%> nor his ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor his ass, <S%H2543><s%> nor any thing <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is thy neighbor's. <S%H7453><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the thunderings, <S%H6963><s%> and the lightnings, <S%H3940><s%> and the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet, <S%H7782><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking: <S%H6226><s%> and when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, they removed, <S%H5128><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> afar off. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us, and we will hear: <S%H8085><s%> but let not <S%H408><s%> God <S%H430><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us, lest <S%H6435><s%> we die. <S%H4191><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: <S%H408><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5668><s%> prove <S%H5254><s%> you, and that <S%H5668><s%> his fear <S%H3374><s%> may be <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> your faces, <S%H6440><s%> that ye sin <S%H2398><s%> not. <S%H1115><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> afar off, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> God <S%H430><s%> was.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I have talked <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you from <S%H4480><s%> heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me gods <S%H430><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall ye make <S%H6213><s%> unto you gods <S%H430><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>

An altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> thou shalt make <S%H6213><s%> unto me, and shalt sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and thy peace offerings, <S%H8002><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and thine oxen: <S%H1241><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> places <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> I record <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> thee.

And if <S%H518><s%> thou wilt make <S%H6213><s%> me an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> it of hewn stone: <S%H1496><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> if thou lift up <S%H5130><s%> thy tool <S%H2719><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, thou hast polluted <S%H2490><s%> it.

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shalt thou go up <S%H5927><s%> by steps <S%H4609><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> mine altar, <S%H4196><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> be not <S%H3808><s%> discovered <S%H1540><s%> thereon. <S%H5921><s%>
